subject: Haskell Invitational
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Headlining what was arguably the deepest field in a Haskell, Lookin at Lucky had the opportunity to show how good he is, and he did not disappoint.
snippet: Headlining what was arguably the deepest field in a Haskell, Lookin at Lucky had the opportunity to show how good he is, and he did not disappoint.
